songs.lyrics:
Yeah, yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah, yeah

Yeah
Sage bhai bane anjaane, anjaane bane bhai
Mere gaanon mein hai sab truth, meri zindagi hai lie
Mere ghar pe kalesh hai, har roz hai ladayi
Kuch bhi nahi hai apna, har cheez hai paraayi
Ye sab kuch bhulaa ke, main studio hun aaya
Na sath mein koi, khud laptop lagaya
Likhe hue gaanon ko fir beat pe bahaya
Peeta nahi par aaj peg neat hai banaya
Log soche mera time up, that I'm 'bout to die
Fir bhi baitha top pe, karte raho try
Gaane saare super duper hit, jisme mera naam aaye
Main sabke kaam aaya but, na koi mere kaam aaye
Fuck them, fuck you man, fuck everyone
Jo kiya wo khud kiya main karun jo bhi mera man
Mere gaane lage chutiya to kaan karle band
Mere shopping mall ne teri dukaan kardi band
Ek tha mera bhai, aaj uski yaad aayi
Wo bhi kaisa time tha, kyon hogayi ladayi
Saari saari raat studio mein, karte the bakaayi
Ladke the do dilli ke, jinhone history banayi
Aaj utna hi akela main, jitna hun main high
Mere C.A se sambhalti nahi, meri kamaai
Third class meri harkatein, first class karun fly
Ego aa hi jaata hai boy, chahe jitna karo try
Cabin band koi shor nahi flight Emirates
Late aaun jaan boojh ke main log karein wait
WiFi 36 hazaar foot pe WhatsApp pe karodon ki main dealein kar raha negotiate
Pichle saal se thoda zyaada hogaya hai weight
Pichle saal se dugna ho gaya hai mera rate
Pichle saal tha main good, is saal hun main great
Agle saal greatest, yaad rakhna ye date
Mere competitor, obsolete ho gaye
Jo bhi bante the bitter, saale sweet ho gaye
Mere aage rapperon ke lafz kho gaye
But I dont give a fuck, mere fucks kho gaye

Mere fucks kho gaye, mere fucks kho gaye
Jo bhi the mere close, wo saare shaqs kho gaye
But I dont give a fuck, mere fucks kho gaye
songs.title: THERAPY
